title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

This script prunes the tips of a tree based on a custom set of tip names.

```{r}
library(ape)
```

Read in the JGI tree to do custom tip pruning
```{r}
jgi <- read.tree("jgi_modded_alltips.txt")
tip_labels <- jgi$tip.label
df <- data.frame(tips = tip_labels)
write.csv(df, "edit_tips.csv", quote = FALSE)
```

Delete tips
```{r}
new_tree <- drop.tip(jgi, tips)
write.tree(new_tree, "jgi_half_pruned.txt")
```
